msg: 1, Many legacy logic depends on the application exception "javax.rmi.NoSuchObjectException" if instance == null in SteatefuleContainer.obtainInstanc().  revert back to NoSuchObjectException.
2, add a workaround in futureAdapter.handleExcption to wrap the NoSuchObjectException with NoSuchEJBException().
